Package OOADHW1

Class ObstaclesView

java.lang.Object
OOADHW1.ObstaclesView
public class ObstaclesView extends Object
This class is used to display enemies and powerups on the screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • ObstaclesView

      public ObstaclesView(Character character, int posX, int width, int height, BufferedImage image, PowerUp isPowerup)
      Parameters:
      character - to get the speed of the shape shifting from right to left.
      posX - the position of the shape on the x-axis
      width - width of shape
      height - height of shape
      image - shape
      isPowerup - powerup type, if any. otherwise it can be null.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      This method updates the coordinates of the shape according to speedX

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g)
      This method draws the shape according to the coordinates of the given graphic object.
      Parameters:
      g - graphics object to draw the shape

    • getRect

      public Rectangle getRect()
      Creates and returns a rectangle object based on the height and width of the image object held in it.
      Returns:
      returns a rectangle of the shape

    • isOutOfScreen

      public boolean isOutOfScreen()
      This method that controls the visibility of the shape on the screen
      Returns:
      If the shape is visible on the screen, it returns false if it is not true.
